name: The Duel (Elemental Code)
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 38

I really didn’t like the theme but if it is a small world that means the world ain’t big enough for the two of us.

One has to die.  Press [X] when the clock strikes high noon to shoot!

Come and duel in this western game fueled by speed and awful time management

(This was made some time ago but was in my github instead of here. Uploaded it here to keep some sort of portfolio)
